changes: Slider now comes in two sizes, medium and small. The default size is medium.
The min default value is now 0.
The hasInputField default value is now true.
The hasHintValues default value is now true.
The hasTooltip prop has been removed. The tooltip is now always shown.
The hasPercent prop has been removed.
Changes in spacing between elements.
fixes: Set the size prop to 'small' get the the smaller size.
Set the min prop to get a custom default value if the new one does not fit your application.
Set the hasInputField prop to false if the default value does not fit your application.
Set the hasHintValues prop to false if the default value does not fit your application.
Remove the hasTooltip prop from your code.
Remove the hasPercent prop from your code.
Ensure the slider's height still fits in your design.

changes: Slider now comes in two sizes, medium and small.
Slider now supports dark theme.
Slider now places its label above all content instead of on each input field.
Slider now validates user input in the input fields.
Slider is now more responsive and automatically adjusts to the available space.
Slider now uses input type='text' instead of input type='number'.
You can give the inputs for a slider custom errors using the errorOptions prop.
You can now customize the aria-label using the ariaLabel prop.
Fixed a bug where the tooltip would be misaligned in Firefox.
Fixed a bug where the latest touched slider would take a long time to get the correct z-index.
Fixed a bug where inputs would become unnecessarily wide if the max prop was a large number.
Internal restructuring of code to make it easier to maintain.
Updated internal dependencies.
Fix broken type export.
Add missing dependency.
Reduced bundle size by improving the way icons are imported and used.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Updated dependencies on internal packages.
Added support for React 18.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.1. This fixes an issue where the component would not properly unmount when used as webcomponent.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.0.
Update @elvia/elvis-toolbox to use reusable components.
The input fields' content and label now right, center, or left align depending on where the input is.
The color of the hint values has been changed from black to grey.
Use @elvia/elvis-toolbox@5.0.0
Fixed a bug where the slider's thumb(s) would become translucent when the Slider was disabled in Safari (iOS).
Moved the label for the Slider with input(s) up to match the designs in Figma.
Padding was added over the Slider with input(s) to prevent the label from overflowing.
fixes: The change impacts the total height of the Slider with input(s) and other compact input elements from the Elvia design system. Ensure to adjust the spacing and/or alignment in your design to account for the larger size of all compact input elements.

changes: Added the Slider component
